name: Digital Bullet Journal
description: A PWA made for my Final Year Project, that aims to capture the user experience of the paper-based Bullet Journal planning system digitally.

name: McIntire Fruit
description: A site designed and developed for a fictional organic fruit-and-veg company, using Vue and Wordpress API.
note: Wordpress API is currently unhosted, so products will not be available at this time.

name: To-Do To-Day
description: A daily  to-do list web application developed using React and styled using TailwindCSS.

name: Unbound Interactive
description: A website designed and built for the indie game development company, Unbound Interactive.

name: Ellie Wilkinson Portfolio
description: A portfolio website designed and built for a technical production student.

name: Meow Meow Chat
description: A cat-themed chat room created using websockets, a Node.js server and Vue.

name: Bonta's Bakery
description: An ecommerce website designed for a fictional bakery.
